description: Variation of condition 2 (approved plans) to planning permission REF PP/2012/3475 dated 26/09/2013 for redevelopment of site to provide a 152 bedroom hotel with ancillary bar and restaurant, basement parking, ground level service yard, visitor drop-off bays, cycle parking and landscaping; following part demolition of and extensions to locally listed building, including construction of an additional storey to main frontage, part 3 and 4 storey extension to west side and part 3, 4 and 5 storey extension to rear. Variation to include removal of previously approved basement level car park re-arrangement of car park from 51 valet spaces at basement level to 45 spaces at ground level  and mezzanine levels, include 8 disabled spaces; increase building footprint at ground level; reduction in floor area at first, second, third and fourth floor levels; reduction in No. bedrooms from 152 (previously approved) to 143. Minor increase in height of roof at Eastern end of building; minor projection of side extension at first, second and third floor levels; and reconfigured plant and PV panels on the roof.
decision_conditions: The hotel development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers (20)_002 Rev P07; (20)_003 Rev P08, (20)_098 Rev P02,  (20)_100 Rev P05, (20)_101 Rev P06; (20)_102 Rev P06; (20)_200 Rev P11, (20)_250 Rev P03, (20)_300 Rev P07; (20)_400 Rev P03, (20)_401 Rev P04.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
